metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for interoperability between coding agents like Claude Code and Codex CLI

plugins.description: Recursive AGENTS.md generator with structural auto-fix, CLAUDE.md harmonization, incremental updates, diff previews, and smart monorepo scoping. Cross-AI compatible.
plugins.name: interdoc

plugins.description: Token-efficient code reconnaissance for LLMs. Autonomous skills save 48-85% tokens via diff-context, semantic search, structural patterns, and symbol analysis. Includes MCP server for direct tool integration.
plugins.name: tldr-swinton
tuivision
plugins.description: TUI automation and visual testing - Playwright for terminal applications. Spawn, interact with, and screenshot TUI apps via MCP.

plugins.name: tool-time
plugins.description: Tool usage analytics for Claude Code and Codex CLI. Tracks tool patterns via hooks, detects inefficiencies, and offers opt-in community comparison with anonymized data.

Self-improving agent rig — codifies product and engineering discipline into composable workflows from brainstorm to ship. Compounds knowledge, generates domain agents, and monitors its own docs. Orchestrates Claude, Codex, and GPT-5.2 Pro through 4 agents, 54 commands, 16 skills, 1 MCP servers. Companions: interphase, interline, interflux, interpath, interwatch, interslack, interform, intercraft, interdev, interpeer, intertest.
plugins.name: clavain

plugins.description: Safe plugin publishing — bumps all version locations, validates sync, commits and pushes with confirmation.
plugins.name: interpub

plugins.description: Analyze your writing style and adapt Claude's output to sound like you. Ingest writing samples, build a voice profile, and apply it to any human-facing documentation or copy.
plugins.name: interfluence
interline
plugins.description: Dynamic statusline for Claude Code — shows active beads with priority and title, workflow phase, coordination status, and Codex dispatch state. Integrates with Clavain, interphase, interlock, and beads.
Phase tracking, gate validation, and work discovery for the Beads issue tracker. Companion plugin for Clavain — adds lifecycle state management on top of the core beads plugin.
plugins.name: interphase

plugins.description: Multi-agent review and research with scored triage, content slicing, and intermediate finding sharing. 17 agents (12 review + 5 research), 4 commands, 1 skill, 1 MCP server. Domain detection via intersense, knowledge via interknow.
plugins.name: interflux
interpath
plugins.description: Product artifact generator — roadmaps, PRDs, vision docs, changelogs, and status reports from beads state, brainstorms, and project context. Companion plugin for Clavain.
Doc freshness monitoring — drift detection, confidence scoring, and auto-refresh orchestration across product artifacts and code docs. Companion plugin for Clavain.
plugins.name: interwatch
interlock
plugins.description: Multi-agent file coordination — reserve files before editing, detect conflicts, exchange messages between agents. MCP server wrapping intermute with hooks, commands, skills, and git pre-commit enforcement. Companion plugin for Clavain.

plugins.name: interslack
plugins.description: Slack integration for Claude Code — send messages, read channels, test integrations.

plugins.name: interform
plugins.description: Design patterns and visual quality for Claude Code — distinctive, production-grade interfaces.

plugins.name: intercraft
plugins.description: Agent-native architecture patterns — design, review, and audit for agent-first applications.

plugins.name: interdev
plugins.description: Developer tooling for Claude Code — MCP CLI interaction and Claude Code reference. Skill authoring moved to interskill, plugin development moved to interplug.

plugins.name: internext
plugins.description: Work prioritization and next-task analysis — tradeoff-aware recommendations from beads state and project context.

plugins.name: interject
plugins.description: Ambient discovery and research engine — scans arXiv, HN, GitHub, Anthropic docs, Exa for new capabilities. MCP server with embedding-based recommendation engine, confidence-tiered output pipeline, and learned interest profiles.
Bidirectional Notion sync for Claude Code. Three-way merge conflict resolution, beads issue tracking, and 21 MCP tools for project lifecycle and sync control.
plugins.name: interkasten
intercheck
plugins.description: Code quality guards — syntax validation for 8 languages and auto-formatting via ruff/shfmt/gofmt/jq/prettier. Session monitoring extracted to interpulse.

Token efficiency benchmarking for agent workflows — PostToolUse:Task hook captures real-time events to SQLite, SessionEnd hook backfills token data from JSONL, report shows percentiles and decision gate.
plugins.name: interstat
interserve
plugins.description: Codex spark classifier and context compression — MCP server exposing classify_sections, extract_sections, and codex_query tools for token-efficient document review.

plugins.name: interlens
plugins.description: 288 FLUX cognitive lenses for structured thinking — MCP server with lens search, thinking mode workflows, belief statement generation, quality evaluation, and solution synthesis.

plugins.name: intermux
plugins.description: Agent activity visibility — tmux monitoring, activity feeds, health detection. Enriches intermute with live context. 7 MCP tools for cross-agent observability.

plugins.name: intersearch
plugins.description: Shared embedding and search infrastructure — nomic-embed-text-v1.5 embeddings with persistent SQLite vector store, and Exa web search. MCP server for semantic indexing and querying.
Project-level code mapping MCP server: project registry, call graphs, impact analysis, agent overlay. Go + Python bridge.
plugins.name: intermap
interpeer
plugins.description: Cross-AI peer review with 4 escalation modes — quick (Claude/Codex), deep (Oracle/GPT), council (multi-model consensus), mine (disagreement extraction into tests and specs).

plugins.name: intersynth
plugins.description: Multi-agent synthesis engine — collects findings from parallel review/research agents, deduplicates, writes structured verdicts, produces compact summaries.
Engineering quality disciplines — systematic debugging (4-phase root-cause investigation), test-driven development (strict RED-GREEN-REFACTOR), and verification gates (iron-law evidence checks).
plugins.name: intertest
intermem
plugins.description: Memory synthesis — graduates stable auto-memory facts to AGENTS.md/CLAUDE.md with stability detection, deduplication, interactive approval, and atomic pruning.

plugins.name: interleave
plugins.description: Deterministic Skeleton with LLM Islands — token-efficient document generation via template-then-fill, where scripts render predictable sections and LLM subagents fill semantic placeholders.

plugins.name: intership
plugins.description: Culture ship names as Claude Code spinner verbs. 237 curated names -- 56 canonical Banks originals marked with *asterisks*, 181 generated Banksian originals. Toggle canonical/generated sets via config. Includes v6 generator prompt for creating more.

plugins.name: intersense
plugins.description: Domain detection — classifies projects by signals (directories, manifests, dependencies, keywords) into domains for review and research targeting.

plugins.name: interknow
plugins.description: Knowledge compounding — durable pattern repository with provenance tracking, temporal decay, and semantic retrieval via qmd MCP server.

plugins.name: intertree
plugins.description: Project hierarchy management — filesystem discovery, parent-child relationships, tagging, and layout orchestration. Extracted from interkasten.

plugins.name: interskill
plugins.description: Skill authoring toolkit — unified skill creation with TDD-adapted testing and audit. Extracted from interdev.

plugins.name: interplug
plugins.description: Plugin development toolkit — lifecycle management, structure validation, and troubleshooting for Claude Code plugins. Extracted from interdev.
Session context monitoring — pressure tracking with time-decay, token estimation, and threshold warnings. Extracted from intercheck.
plugins.name: interpulse

plugins.description: Agent trust scoring — severity-weighted time-decayed reputation tracking. Records finding acceptance/rejection, computes blended project/global trust scores, identifies suppression candidates.
plugins.name: intertrust

plugins.description: Agent and agency naming for legible orchestration — deterministic, memorable identities across all surfaces. 4 themes: Culture (Banks-style), Demarch (diplomatic), NATO (phonetic), custom.
plugins.name: intername

plugins.description: Documentation quality toolkit — enforces CLAUDE.md/AGENTS.md boundaries, applies progressive disclosure, deduplicates across doc hierarchy. 1 skill with audit, refactor, and consolidate modes.
plugins.name: interscribe

plugins.description: Feature-level success metric tracking for Demarch
plugins.name: intertrack

plugins.description: Cross-module integration gap tracer — traces data flows from shipped features to find unverified consumer edges.
plugins.name: intertrace
